issue.title: [Go][Parquet] Disabling dictionary encoding per column in writer config broken
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16813](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16813). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Small bug in how we set column level dictionary encoding config, always set to true rather than respecting input value.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16813?focusedCommentId=17553592) by Matthew Topol (zeroshade):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13357
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13357>
